obj: Update company-hierarchy.md with Integration Gate in roster, PO layer in team structure, correct agent count (~36). Update shared.toon with Owner Mode 0 deprecation. Update naming-conventions.md with new Phase 4-5 artifact types (test-results.jsonl, escalation.jsonl).

a: Add Integration Gate agent to company-hierarchy.md roster table and update total agent count from ~31 to ~36
v: grep 'integration-gate' references/company-hierarchy.md returns match; agent count says ~36
done: Integration Gate in roster, agent count accurate

a: Update company-hierarchy.md Team Structure to add Integration Pipeline section with Integration Gate, PO QA, Delivery mode
done: Team Structure section documents integration pipeline

a: Add Owner Mode 0 deprecation notice to shared.toon owner_protocol modes table
done: shared.toon documents Mode 0 deprecation when po.enabled=true

a: Add test-results.jsonl, escalation.jsonl, and research.jsonl ra/rt fields to naming-conventions.md
done: naming-conventions.md documents all Phase 4-5 artifact types

a: Update company-hierarchy.md 11-Step Workflow table to include Steps 11.5 and 12 (Integration Gate, PO QA/Delivery)
done: 11-Step Workflow table shows Steps 11.5 and 12 with Integration Gate and PO QA
